lines.text: [after he and Randy have dodged a murderous gang of outlaws, Ford starts to ride back into town]
There's something I want to attend to before I get out of these mountains.
I was hoping to die of old age like normal people.
You know, weddings are something like measles.
Yeah, you got to have 'em once to get used to 'em.
Hey! Aren't you taking the wrong trail?
All trails lead out of these mountains, and right now that's my life's ambition.
White women, squaw women, just the same... cannot tell which way they will jump.
